description: Is Karma submissive? Or does she just like to be tied up and made to cum? Does she secretly desire to be completely controlled? But then like to struggle when bound? Is it a role play, is it a game...perhaps, but when shackled in a deep pool everything becomes very real...the pain, the multiple orgasms and the feeling that the next 3 hours will be decided by someone else. So what we do we do to her? Tie her tight and make her carry a heavy ball with her crotch, make her orgasm and then scrub the cum off her...and all of that is only the beginning!
title: Karma
